original_title: PHIs to raid shops selling food unfit for human consumption
original_body_lines: Raids will be carried out till April 25 to identify shops selling food unfit for human consumption during the festive season, the Sri Lanka Public Health Inspectors' Association said.
PHI's Union President Upul Rohana said that about 3,200 public health inspectors have been deployed for this purpose. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
